QuestData.Title: The Waterspeaker's Staff
QuestData.Description: There is great dissent in Inkgill, $r. Elder Shai Hu drank the sha-corrupted waters of the mere, and forced the others to do the same. When I protested, Orachi of the town guard confiscated my ritual staff and banished me.$b$bNow, I am not only an exile, I am unable to speak with the waters that once gave me guidance!$b$bI am not a fighter. But if you are, perhaps you can recover my staff from Orachi? He is in town to our north.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover Waterspeaker Gorai's Stolen Inkgill Ritual Staff from Orachi in Inkgill Mere.
QuestData.RewardText: Good. Now we have some hope of redeeming this situation.
